title: Turael

properties.name: description
properties.value: Turael is the lowest level Slayer Master, along with his daughter Spria. Turael resides in Burthorpe; the fastest way to reach him is to teleport to Burthorpe Games Room using a games necklace and running east to Turael's house, just south of the general store.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Turael
"Turadel" redirects here. For the other slayer master, see Duradel.
Turael
Released26 January 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationBurthorpe
Sells itemsSlayer Equipment
QuestAnimal Magnetism
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to, Assignment, Trade, Rewards
ExamineHe looks dangerous!
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID401

Turael is the lowest level Slayer Master, along with his daughter Spria. Turael resides in Burthorpe; the fastest way to reach him is to teleport to Burthorpe Games Room using a games necklace and running east to Turael's house, just south of the general store.

There are no level requirements to receive Slayer tasks from him.

Additionally, Turael is capable of changing your slayer task from another master into a less difficult one. If the other master has assigned you a task Turael could assign himself, your request will not work. Moreover, he will issue a change only once per task type. Warning: After a task change is processed, your task streak will also be reset to zero.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Tasks
  • 3 Dialogue
  • 4 Trivia

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Turael is the solution to the easy cryptic clue: Talk to Turael in Burthorpe.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Click here for a list of other transcripts that this NPC speaks in.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Turael's name may be a pun on "tutorial," as he is the easiest Slayer Master, and thus serves as a tutorial for the Slayer skill.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 August 2020
(update)

Turael's Slayer task completion messages will now suggest that you try a higher level task to get reward points, instead of just telling you that you didn't earn any.

[[File:Turael chathead.png|left]]
'''Turael''' is the lowest level [[Slayer Master]], along with his daughter [[Spria]]. Turael resides in [[Burthorpe]]; the fastest way to reach him is to [[Teleportation|teleport]] to [[Burthorpe Games Room]] using a [[games necklace]] and running east to Turael's house, just south of the general store.

There are no level requirements to receive [[Slayer task]]s from him. 

Additionally, Turael is capable of changing your slayer task from another master into a less difficult one. If the other master has assigned you a task Turael could assign himself, your request will not work. Moreover, he will issue a change '''only once''' per task type. '''{{Colour|red|Warning}}: After a task change is processed, your [[Slayer reward point|task streak]] will also be reset to zero.'''

==Treasure Trails==
*{{CrypticNPC|Turael|easy|Talk to Turael in Burthorpe.}}

So an Aberrant Spectre has a sort value of 6065 because it has a 60 Slayer req and a 65 combat req.
A Crocodile only has a combat req of 50, so its sort value is 50
Lizards have a slayer req of 22 with no combat req, so their sort value is 2200, with the 0s at the end to make sure it sorts correctly-->
